review: This unit is excellent. I bought it for my upstairs bedroom so I could watch Netflix without moving the Xbox up and down the stairs. It's small and convenient. You do need a power source beyong plugging it into the TV. You can use a USB or a standard power cable. I reccomend the power cable since it says using USB may not give the unit sufficient power
author: Heisenburg

review: Have had the Stick for 2 months now and have noticed a series of issues with picture freezes and unable to connect to Netflix and other channels.  The stick seems to heat up excessively and if disconnected and allowed to cool it seems to improve performance.

review: I love this thing, except for 1 issue. I've had a couple buffer issues, but only because I'm running a ton of stuff off my wireless router.
